resources:
Ebola RISK Settings Information
Continue to the app Calculate risk Important information
"Ebola RISK is a proof-of-concept app designed to illustrate how Machine Learning " "models for clinical prognosis could inform patient care and management. It offers " "treatment options compiled from WHO\'s guidelines for hemorrhagic fever patients, " "prioritized by predicted mortality risk."
"Because it is a research prototype, this app should NOT be used to make treatment " "decisions on actual patients."
"For questions or comments contact the author (Andres Colubri) at:"
"Get the preprint of the article describing the derivation and validation of the models from:" ScrollingActivity "Material is the metaphor.\n\n"
